byline.contributor: Declan Walsh contributed reporting from London.

abstract: Pakistan's military credits Afghan security forces with helping capture Taliban militants linked to attack on Peshawar school that killed 150 people; public acknowledgement signals possible sign of closer collaborations between two countries that have history of animosity.
lead_paragraph: The acknowledgment signaled a possible sign of closer collaboration between the two countries, which have often been unfriendly neighbors.

headline.main: In a Shift, Pakistan Pats Afghanistan on the Back
headline.print_headline: In a Shift, Pakistan Pats Afghanistan on the Back

snippet: The acknowledgment signaled a possible sign of closer collaboration between the two countries, which have often been unfriendly neighbors.
